nodes.text: A bounty hunter was hired as part of a group of fellow hunters by a Rodian/Sullustan crime syndicate to capture a team of undercover Alliance Intelligence agents on the planet Bothawui and bring them in alive. Although the group of bounty hunters failed to capture their marks after an initial skirmish with the Alliance agents, one hunter remained to ambush the agents later on. Descending from the sky via jetpack and wielding a rocket launcher, the hunter prepared to kill the agents, no longer caring about the part of the contract specifying a live capture, but was soon attacked from behind by a wild krak'jya beast.
The adventure specifically leaves open the bounty hunter's sex.
